name: Leading Jockey Highbred
overview: Leading Jockey Highbred is a horse racing game and is the first in the Leading Jockery series for the PSOne. In the game the player can compete in differents tracks and in a variety of weather conditions like sun, cloudy or rain. The gameplay is really arcade since to gain speed the player has to press the Circle Button lots of time, but it also has to be careful not to tire so much his horse or the horse stamina will be over, and reduce to speed at the end of the race, so is better to be in the group and accelerate in the last part of the race to have some chances of win.
